text: Apologies for the ongoing #powercut affecting #GL56 #Blockley our engineers continue to work on the fault and are now estimating to have power restored by 04:00. Ellie
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Blockley #B20 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Ellie
Apologies for the #powercut in #Blockley #GL56 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 01:00. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Birmingham #B20 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 00:00. Geraint

Update #powercut #Leicester #LE5 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 07:00. Siân

There  is  a #powercut in #LE5 Leicester & surrounding areas. We're working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 02:30. We're currently switching to restore power sooner, this results in customers seeing brief interruptions. Apologies for the disruption.
